WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ
IN 11-48.1N 056-28.6W AT 061725Z MAR.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP
A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
TELEX: 42912008, INMARSAT-C: 422799024,
PHONE: 59 659 670 9292, FAX: 59 659 663 2450,
E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
